channel.title: BNS on Math Life
channel.description: Recent content in BNS on Math Life

item.title: Blet
item.description: In 2018 I was invited by my former ICTP Diploma student M. Saskia to give a mini-course at the University of Vienna. I also gave a general talk about the puzzle Blet. Later in the year I have a Basic Notions Seminar on the puzzle at ICTP. As an experiment I got the transcript of the talk from youtube and then ran it through ChatGPT. After some light editing here is the result.

item.title: Impartial Games
item.description: I gave a the kick-off Basic Notions talk at ICTP in 2014 on Impartial Games (one of the topics of the course Math, Puzzles and Computers).
